name: Traps Adventures for HD
description:
This game will be the best challenge games! It'sVERY STRESSFUL.

This may be the most hardest, irritating, frustrating game EVER. You may get so irritated and frustrated that you throw your phone out the window.

I can't take any responsibilities for the displeasure this game may cause.

Good luck.

**Optimized for iPhone 5(s), iPhone 6(s), iPhone 6(s) Plus, iPhone 7 (Plus), iPhone 8 (Plus), iPhone X and all iPad devices
